Serene fields of jasmine sambac. The most precious jasmine of all. Pure white buds plucked at dawn. Fresh with dew. Coveted gems of the colourful Indian flower market. Our luxurious Bubble Bath nourishes skin with wonderfully fragrant bubbles. Infused with the scent of Black Cedarwood & Juniper. A relaxing bath time indulgence, its formula is enriched with a blend of sumptuous, skin-conditioning ingredients to cleanse and soften. All dressed up in a decorative bottle from Queen of Pop, a limited edition collection curated by Poppy Delevingne.

products.DESCRIPTION: Our refreshing Body & Hand Wash with meadow foam seed cleanses and scents skin with Black Cedarwood & Juniper. A fragrance seductive with cumin and chilli leaves. Dark with cedarwood. Humid with moss. The enhanced formula helps leave body and hands feeling conditioned and soft. Its crystal clear gel transforms into a rich lather while its uplifting fragrance fills the bathroom, immersing you in scent.

Serene fields of jasmine sambac. The most precious jasmine of all. Pure white buds plucked at dawn. Fresh with dew. Coveted gems of the colourful Indian flower market. Glowing against vibrant marigold and exotic ylang ylang. A beautiful contrast of garlands. Entwined with rich benzoin resin. Enveloped by the warmth of vanilla and amber.

Precious oud, reframed. The mysterious, smoky character of this revered wood, central to Middle Eastern fragrance traditions, radiates with the clarity of crisp bergamot and an orange granite accord. Hypnotic. Alluring.

Also available in 50ml.
